name: To the Concert
description:
My entry for the BeansJam22, had only just a small idea. Didn't get this idea to a full game. Just finished what I had.

You are on the way to a concert, keep yourself and your driver awake, because WE MUST STAY AWAKE.

Theme: We must stay awake

Challenges:
Ein einziger Knopf (Maustaste)
Handgemalt
Wer lesen kann

Music by Stockaudios from Pixabay
Sound Effect from Pixabay
Car sound from bigsoundbank.com
Fonts from kenney and dafont
